Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item carries a unique value that goes beyond its price tag, making it an invaluable addition to any collection. Considering its extraordinary features and benefits, I am offering it to you for $12000. This generous offer reflects my confidence in the product's ability to exceed your expectations. I believe this investment will not only provide you with unparalleled utility but also appreciate in value over time. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to serve you with our premium product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
